name: Lunar Journey
storyline:
You have a mission to accomplish on the Moon. Collect the 6 minerals to analyse them on earth. 
 
Aluminium, calcium, magnesium, iron, titanium, silicon. 
 
Suddenly the adventure takes an unexpected turn. It seems that you are not alone on the moon!! 
 
It seems that the mission will be more complicated than expected, so you will have to use your wits to overcome the mission. The aliens will not make it easy for you, although they are quite cute and lunatic.
summary: Lunar Journey is a space adventure game where you are traversing the moon to collect six different materials and solving puzzles along the way.
